item.title: Joined to Skillshare.com
item.description: Recently, I was invited to Skillshare.com. They said that “will you teach about Google Apps Script?”. I thought that if I can be helpful for other users, I’m glad. So I joined to there and created a presentation. I would like to create more classed in the future. If those were helpful for you, I’m glad.
